Dear Ross,

 

Thank you for the notification.

 

We note that the cargo was delivered on May 30, 2025. Could you please clarify why this has only been reported now?

 

In addition, please provide the following:

*	Email notice from Sephora Dubai Mall advising the shortage
*	Notice of loss against the carriers / forwarders and their response
*	Photographs of the carton/pallet upon receipt of the cargo

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive.
